remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含与配置设置进行连接的静态方法。The class contains static methods for interfacing with configuration settings. 方法允许开发人员若要配置远程处理基础结构通过使用 XML 格式的配置文件。The method allows developers to configure the remoting infrastructure through the use of XML formatted configuration files. 类还包含几种方法的客户端的客户端和服务器端注册和激活的服务器对象驻留在服务器上。The class also contains several methods for client-end and server-end registration of client and server activated objects that reside on the server. 类提供了多种方法，以帮助进行使用和发布远程对象。The class provides a number of methods to help in using and publishing remoted objects. 方法提供了有关将激活和与中的一个实例的远程对象通信所需的所有相关信息存储功能类进行序列化和传输到远程位置的更高版本。The method provides the functionality for storing all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object in an instance of the class for later serialization and transmission to a remote location. 方法可反转此过程中，创建可由应用程序而不考虑任何远程处理分支的远程对象的代理。The method reverses this process, creating a proxy for a remote object that can be used by an application without regard for any remoting subdivisions. 类承载激活和与远程对象通信所需的所有相关信息。The class holds all the relevant information required to activate and communicate with a remote object. 此类是传输到远程位置使用的通道将被取消封送的对象的可序列化表示形式 (请参阅) 和可用于创建远程连接对象的本地代理。This class is a serializable representation of an object that is transmitted to a remote location using a channel, where it is unmarshaled (see ) and can be used to create a local proxy of the remoted object. > [!NOTE] > 由引用封送对象 (Mbr) 不驻留在内存中。Marshal-by-reference objects (MBRs) do not reside in memory forever. 相反，除非该类型重写若要控制其自己的生存期策略，每个 MBR 都有有限的生存时间之前的.NET Framework 远程处理系统开始删除并回收内存的过程。Instead, unless the type overrides to control its own lifetime policies, each MBR has a finite lifetime before the .NET Framework remoting system begins the process of deleting it and reclaiming the memory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[生存期租约](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx)。For more information, see [Lifetime Leases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23bk23zc.aspx).
